title: B.Sc. FD - Shree Devi College of Fashion Design - Fashion designing courses
content: directly admitted to II year (III Semester) programmes (i) Costume Design & Dress Making, (ii) Apparel Design & Fashion Technology, (iii) Diploma in Handloom Technology, (iv) Diploma in Textile Technology, (v) Diploma in Textile Processing, (vi) Diploma in Weaving Technology, (vii) Diploma in Knitting Technology, (viii) Diploma in Leather Technology. Curriculum Overview The duration of the

title: B.Sc. FD - Shree Devi College of Fashion Design - Fashion designing courses
content: programme shall extend over a period of six semesters (3 academic years). A candidate shall undergo a compulsory in-house training of 2 months in any of the Research and Development institutions, factories or related institutions or organizations before appearing for final year (VI semester) examinations. content: in the hospitality sector which has seen tremendous growth in recent years. Today, hospitality is the world’s largest generator of jobs, and in the next ten years this global industry will continue to add another 130 million jobs. content: required by this specialist sector of the services industry. The Bachelor of Science Degree in Food Technology & Food Nutrition and Dietetics is propsed with the objective of developing a job-oriented programme for placement in the Food Industry or to enable startups in the emerging field of Food Technology. The course content has been prepared keeping in view, the unique requirements of B.Sc.

title: Overview - Hotel Management

The objectives of the programme are as follows: To impart knowledge of various areas related to Food technology To enable students to understand composition of food and its physico-chemical, nutritional, microbiological and sensory/quality aspects To familiarize students about processing and preservation technologies of fruits, vegetables, pulses, oilseeds, spices, meat,

title: Overview - Hotel Management
content: fish, poultry, milk, & milk products To emphasize the importance of food safety, food quality, food plant sanitation, food laws and regulations, food engineering and packaging in food industry. Interior Design goes beyond the architectural definitions of space. Interior designing is the planning, layout and design of interior spaces within

title: Overview - Shree Devi College of Interior Design - BSc in Interior Design
content: buildings. The purpose of interior designing is the functional improvement, aesthetic enrichment and psychological enhancement of interior spaces. Everyone wishes to reside, work or to be around in an aesthetically set room or building which needs the assistance of trained designers and decorators. Modern lifestyles demand a sophistication in interiors, both residential and commercial, that

title: Overview - Shree Devi College of Interior Design - BSc in Interior Design
content: clearly define aesthetic inclinations. There is a dearth of trained personnel who can cater to the increasing demand of distinct designs that incorporate beauty and practicability. They have to be sought in institutes and colleges that train interior designers, which at the moment are grossly inadequate. Therefore there is a pressing need to set up more colleges that impart specialized training in

title: Overview - Shree Devi College of Interior Design - BSc in Interior Design
content: this stream. Shree Devi College of Interior Design offers training in this art of beautifying living spaces. The college has all the requisite infrastructure needed to gain the best of knowledge, both theoretical as well as practical in the intricacies of interior designing and decoration. The college has the credit of bagging the first rank in the Mangalore University examination consequently for

title: About Us - Shree Devi College of Interior Design - Interior Design and Decoration
content: Shree Devi Colleges Shree Devi Colleges Contact Us B.Sc in Interior Designing Shree Devi College of Interior Design We spend a major portion of our lives indoors- in the interior spaces created by the structures and shells of buildings. Interior Design goes beyond the architectural definitions of space. Interior designing is the planning, layout and design of interior spaces within buildings. The

title: About Us - Shree Devi College of Interior Design - Interior Design and Decoration
content: purpose of interior designing is the functional improvement, aesthetic enrichment and psychological enhancement of interior spaces. Everyone wishes to reside, work or relax in an aesthetically designed room or building. This needs the assistance of trained designers and decorators. Modern lifestyles demand a sophistication in interiors, both residential and commercial, that clearly define

title: About Us - Shree Devi College of Interior Design - Interior Design and Decoration
content: aesthetic inclinations. There is a dearth of trained personnel who can cater to the increasing demand for designs that incorporate beauty and practicability. This indicates that there is a pressing need to set up more colleges that impart specialized training in this stream. Shree Devi College of Interior Design offers training in the art of beautifying living spaces. The college has all the

title: About Us - Shree Devi College of Interior Design - Interior Design and Decoration
content: requisite infrastructure needed to gain the best of knowledge, both theoretical as well as practical, in the intricacies of interior designing and decoration. The college has the credit of bagging the first rank in the Mangalore University examinations consecutively for the last three years.

title: M. Pharm - M.Pharm Post graduation colleges in Mangalore - B.Pharm Colleges

Duration The course of study including submission of dissertation on the

title: M. Pharm - M.Pharm Post graduation colleges in Mangalore - B.Pharm Colleges
content: topic registered shall be of 24 months ( 2 years) duration from the commencement of academic year. The study of M.Pharm course shall be of annual system that includes M.Pharm part-I , extending for 12 months from the commencement of academic term and M.Pharm part-II of 12 months’ duration. At the end of M.Pharm part-I there shall be a university examination of M.Pharm part-I. At the end of M.Pharm

title: GNM | Nursing
content: Admission Successful completion of 10+2 class passed from a recognised Board or any equivalent examination with 40 percent marks. Candidates seeking admission to GNM course should have completed 17 years of age. On scrutiny of applications received, eligible candidates will be selected. Candidates selected will have to get themselves admitted immediately on payment of fees prescribed. All

title: GNM | Nursing
content: admissions are subject to eligibility conditions of Karnataka State Diploma in Nursing Examination Board, Bangalore. content: Adjustment, Nursing administration and Ward Management

The theory part of the IPCC shall be evaluated both by CIE and SEE. The practical part shall be evaluated by only CIE (no

title: Mtech-Construction-Technology.pdf
content: SEE). However, questions from the practical part of IPCC shall be included in the SEE question paper. Audit Courses /Ability Enhancement Courses Suggested by BOS (ONLINE courses): These are prerequisite courses suggested by the concerned Board of Studies. Ability Enhancement Courses will be suggested by the BoS if prerequisite courses are not required for the programs. Ability Enhancement Courses:

title: Mtech-Construction-Technology.pdf
content:  These courses are prescribed to help students to enhance their skills in fields connected to the field of specialisation as well as allied fields that leads to employable skills. Involving in learning such courses is impetus to lifelong learning.  The courses under this category are online courses published in advance and approved by the concerned Board of Studies.  Registration to Audit

title: Mtech-Construction-Technology.pdf
content: /Ability Enhancement Course shall be done in consultation with the mentor and is compulsory during the concerned semester.  In case a candidate fails to appear for the proctored examination or fails to pass the selected online course, he/she can register and appear for the same course if offered during the next session or register for a new course offered during that session, in consultation with

title: Mtech-Construction-Technology.pdf
content: the mentor.  The Audit/ Ability Enhancement Course carries no credit and is not counted for vertical progression. However, a pass in such a course is mandatory for the award of the degree. Skill development activities: Under Skill development activities in a concerned course, the students should 1. Interact with industry (small, medium, and large). 2. Involve in research/testing/projects to

title: Mtech-Construction-Technology.pdf
content: understand their problems and help for evolving creative and innovative methods to solve the problem. 3. Involve in case studies and field visits/ fieldworks. 4. Accustom to the use of standards/codes etc., to narrow the gap between academia and industry. 5. Handle advanced instruments to enhance technical talent. 6. Gain confidence in modelling of systems and algorithms for transient and

title: Mtech-Construction-Technology.pdf
content: steady-state operations, thermal study, etc. 7. Work on different soft-wares/tools to simulate, analyze and authenticate the output to interpret and conclude. All activities should enhance student’s abilities to employment and/or self-employment opportunities, management skills, Statistical analysis, fiscal expertise, etc. Students and the course instructor/s to involve either individually or in

title: Mtech-Construction-Technology.pdf
content: group to interact together to enhance the learning and application skills of the study they have undertaken. The students with the help of the course teacher can take up relevant technical activities which will enhance their skill. content: Shree Devi Colleges Shree Devi Colleges Contact Us M.S.W About Social Work Mangalore, the vibrant city nestling between the Arabian Sea and the Western Ghats, rides high on the crest of fame endowed by myriad educational institutions providing the base for many a professional career. Nature has been generous to this coastal city. Rustic charms exist side by side with cosmopolitan sophistication in

title: Overview - Shree Devi Institute of Social Work - Top MSW training in Mangalore
content: this land of outstanding bankers and academicians. The city teems with a large number of students from all over the country and abroad, attracted by the excellent educational options available over here in the many institutions of repute. Among those centres of scholarly pursuits that pave the way to promising futures, the name of Shree Devi Education Trust figures prominently. On the foundation

title: Overview - Shree Devi Institute of Social Work - Top MSW training in Mangalore
content: of this establishment have sprung various professional colleges that cater to the burgeoning needs of those in search of viable, career-oriented education. Shree Devi Educational Trust offers students the opportunity of pursuing career-oriented courses at its various institutions. It enables the students to get into a vocation that is based on philanthropic attitudes and service-mindedness. The

title: Overview - Shree Devi Institute of Social Work - Top MSW training in Mangalore
content: postgraduate course in Social Service aims at furthering the student’s knowledge of the field through a system that is designed to provide value additions to the course of study.

content: Shree Devi Colleges Shree Devi Colleges Contact Us M.S.W Shree Devi Institute of Social Work Shree Devi Institute of Social Work opened its doors to students in the year 1999 and is affiliated to the Mangalore University. “There is neither greater joy nor greater reward than to make a fundamental difference in someone’s life” – with this note we provide a rich learning environment where the

title: Principal’s Message - Shree Devi Institute of Social Work - MSW Colleges
content: teaching faculty take every opportunity to help students gain knowledge and an understanding of the concepts. In addition, we believe that it is critical to teach students to apply what they learn, which results in a balanced education – a balance of knowledge and application. Our department fosters a homely atmosphere where every student is involved, encouraged and supported. We strive to enable

title: Principal’s Message - Shree Devi Institute of Social Work - MSW Colleges
content: all our students to reach high levels of achievement and to acquire the knowledge, skills and values they need to contribute to the well-being of a global society. Our main aim is to produce conscientious, smart and confident citizens of India who will go out into the world and make us proud.

Shree Devi Institute of Technology Kenjar Mangalore is the second institute in the country to have the tie up with the prestigious North Dakota State of University(NDSU), USA.

title: Vision and Mission
content:
Vision: To be an institution of academic excellence imparting technical and management education integrated with human values to face social and environmental challenges.
Mission: Disseminate quality education with student-centric learning methodologies, actively engage students, faculty and staff, mentor students with career development support, and impart education that empowers them to emerge as professionals with entrepreneurial attitudes and ethical values.

title: Accreditation, Rankings and Achievements
content:
Shree Devi Institute of Technology (SDIT), Mangalore: Accredited by NAAC, approved by AICTE, affiliated with VTU.
Shree Devi College: Recognized by UGC, affiliated with Mangalore University.
Shree Devi College of Pharmacy: Approved by PCI.
Rankings: SDIT not ranked in NIRF; UNIRANKS global ranking 18131.
Achievements include university ranks across departments, 'Excellent Engineering College in Karnataka' award, 'Gold Ranking as a Green College' award, and 90–95% placement record with recruiters like TCS, Infosys, Wipro.

title: Campus Map and Facilities Overview
content: The SDIT campus at Kenjar, Mangalore includes separate hostels, modern labs, a library, a sports complex, a cafeteria, and shuttle services. Other Shree Devi institutions offer auditoriums, transportation, medical facilities, and guest houses.

title: Faculty Information
content: Faculty details for SDIT, Nursing, and Physiotherapy colleges include names, designations, qualifications, and experience. Example: Dr. K.E. Prakash (Principal, Ph.D. Civil Engineering), Dr. Dilip Kumar K., Ms. Annie Joseph (Professor, ECE), Prof. Anand S. Uppar (HOD, CSE), Dr. Gayathri Babu J. (HOD, MBA).

title: Admission Procedure, Eligibility and Fees
content: SDIT admissions for BE, MBA, MCA, M.Tech are based on KCET, COMEDK, or PGCET. Eligibility: 10+2 with 45% PCM for BE, graduation with 50% for MBA/MCA. Fees range ₹3.8L–₹7.4L (BE) and ₹1.1L–₹2.3L (MBA). Nursing, Physiotherapy, and Allied Health programs follow merit and entrance-based admissions through UUCMS. Key dates from UUCMS or University site.

title: Courses Offered under Shree Devi Education Trust
content:
SDIT: BE (CSE, AI&ML, ECE, Mechanical, Civil, etc.), M.Tech, MBA, MCA, Ph.D.
College of Pharmacy: B.Pharm, M.Pharm, Pharm.D.
College of Nursing: GNM, B.Sc Nursing, M.Sc Nursing.
Allied Health Sciences: B.Sc MLT, MIT, OT, RCT, RDT.
Physiotherapy: BPT, MPT.

title: Events, Workshops, and Clubs
content: Major events: SHREE DEVI SAMBHRAM (National fest), SURABHI (Intra-college fest), Samshodhan, Technospark, and Zaika. Clubs: Coders Nexus, Lingua Nova, Media Mavericks, Eco Club, Finance and HR clubs. Social initiatives include Samarpan (outreach, charity, beach cleanup).

title: Campus Facilities
content:
Hostels: Separate for boys and girls with hygienic food and amenities.
Canteen: Hygienic, variety of food options.
Library: Central library with e-resources and Helinet access.
Transport: Bus fleet covering Mangalore and surroundings.
Sports & Medical: Indoor/outdoor sports, health center, first-aid.

title: Placement and Training
content: SDIT Placement Cell offers training and organizes drives. Placement rate 90–95%, avg package ₹3.12 LPA. Recruiters: Infosys, TCS, Wipro, Amazon, Oracle, etc. Hotel Management: 100% placements with Oberoi, Taj, Leela. Nursing and Physiotherapy: placements in Apollo, Fortis, and Max Hospitals.

title: Student FAQs and Campus Life
content: FAQs include admission documents, dress code, hostel rules, campus life, clubs, and placements. Wi-Fi available with varying coverage. Industrial visits and internships supported. Students advised to verify academic details via UUCMS.

title: Kenjar Campus – Infrastructure & Connectivity
content: Kenjar campus includes state-of-the-art labs, library, hostels for boys & girls, is located close to the airport and approx 12 km from the railway station. Reviews mention modern labs and good infrastructure. :contentReference[oaicite:15]{index=15}

title: M.G. Road/Ballalbagh Campus – Infrastructure Overview
content: City-campus in Ballalbagh/M.G. Road, convenient urban location, compact layout; serves multiple programs including commerce, BCA etc. :contentReference[oaicite:16]{index=16}
